title: Are you willing to revolt against yourself,
author: Paul Cutler

comments.content:
Specify.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040636/http:/www.thefontry.com/)

I'm waiting to have the willpower.  
One day I will make my current self vanish.

hhp

not just willing, but eager, and  
even looking for a good excuse. :+)

-bowerbird

Nah, I'm only in it for the money! ;-)

cheerio Queneau
I'm more likely to simply find myself revolting.

This is revolting.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040636/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
I'm in a constant revolution within myself. Which explains why my head is always spinning.
I'm still trying to volt.

_I’m still trying to volt._

I'm not eligable to volt - no volters registration...

and there's no place like ohm...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040636/http:/www.thefontry.com/)

I though Evolution was bad enough already?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040636im_/http:/typophile.com/files/monkey_5151.jpg)

(I guess Darwin's revolving in his grave right now :-) )
If you are naturally revolting, how can you revolt against yourself, without ceasing to revolt?

I have a Mac so I can't VOLT.

ChrisL
With the latest AFDKO you won't need to.  :)

Thanks, Karsten, that is great news! Now when will it be out for Mac? :-)

or are you referring to 2.5 which just came out this year?

ChrisL

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Apemen.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040636/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Apemen.JPG "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Apemen.JPG")  
By the way, I haven‘t seen no one, nobody, anybody(?) mentioning Arthur C. Clark death in here. How come?  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
“We’re gonna spend a whole lot of time together pal” [- Benjamin Jacob](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040636/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thing_(comics))

I see your avatar there!

ChrisL
Come the revolution, I will be first against the wall. Or, if not first, forming an orderly queue.

John has been VOLTing for so long that REvolting is second nature to him :-)

ChrisL
Just try post revolting or even neo revolting. It is the same, but this time you get to misuse the word irony when you explain yourself.

I have never been comfortable with the creative process.

pbc
Comfort is probably overrated.

To paraphrase Lenin: Only when my top no longer can and my bottom no longer wants.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Personal Art and Design Portal of Ivan Gulkov  
 [www.ivangdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804040636/http:/www.ivangdesign.com/ "www.ivangdesign.com")

To revolt against oneself is to Format ones heart?  
Do not you apply reason?  
Quick-Formatting with Flowers

Reason is the last refuge of scoundrels. Now that, was cheap.

Sincerely Aziz, I have always read what you have written with great interest. I believe also believe in God, whatever that is…

•—••••-••••••-•-•
